## NumberOperations.fromNumber() method

Returns an instance of the scalar type which most accurately corresponds to the value of `num`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromNumber(num: number): number;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
